item.description: The major agenda is to eat, drink, talk about past sushi experiences, and create new ones. There is a new young chef at Akasaka on loan from NY, he is really amazing I've had some of the best meals I've ever had in my long japanese eating career there lately and would love to share this experience with others!
item.why: If sushi calls to you in your sleep and the just the mention of it brings a smile to your face.....you know why you should come.....

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: The Middle of CT Sushi January Meetup
